#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {

int testCases, number, sum = 0, number2;
cin >> testCases;
for(int x = 1; x <= testCases; x++)
{
    cin >> number;
    number2 = number;
    while(number > 0)
    {
        sum = sum + number%10;
        number = number/10;
    }
    sum = number2%sum;
    cout << sum << endl;
    sum = 0;
}
return 0;
}
